channel.title: St Mary's Composite Squadron
channel.description: The United States Air Force Auxiliary

item.title: Meeting 7/5/17
item.dc:creator: Hailey Hall
item.description: TweetTonight, cadets returned from encampment and shared their experiences with fellow cadets. To prove their knowledge, cadets were tested on memory work, which includes the cadet oath, honor code, core values, and CAP founding date. Being in Dress Blues, there … Continue reading →

item.title: Meeting 6/7/17
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rioux
item.description: Tweet Tonight, there was a cycling of staff positions. Thankfully, cadets were still able to complete all requirements to promote.

item.title: Meeting 5/31/17
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rioux
item.description: Tweet Tonight, cadets were able to relax a bit during our squadron’s social potluck. Everyone brought food, and we were able to socialize and chat. After about an hour, there was a public speaking class that was able to take … Continue reading →

item.title: Meeting 5/24/17
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rioux
item.description: Tweet Tonight, cadets were able to take their PT tests. As usual, this included a mile long timed run, pushups, sit-ups, and a leg stretch. Captain Webster gave a class on DDR, and this time talked about how opiods and … Continue reading →

item.title: Meeting 5/17/17
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rioux
item.description: Tweet Col. Trick gave a class on Character Development, expanding upon jobs and potential avenues of life once one graduates college. The class went very well, and cadets were able to learn a lot. Cadets were able to voice their … Continue reading →

item.title: Meeting 5/10/17
item.dc:creator: Michael Plunk
item.description: Tweet This evening cadets were able to drill with their flights for some of the meeting. After that, C/TSgt Plunk gave a brief tutorial on eServices and how to navigate it. He showed cadets how to get to their 101 … Continue reading →

item.title: Meeting 4/19/17
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rioux
item.description: Tweet Today, Senior Member Lang gave a DDR class, discussing what effects drugs have on you, and how drug use affects your career. Also discussed were the long term effects of drugs on a cadets life, even into adulthood. They … Continue reading →

item.title: Meeting 4/12/17
item.dc:creator: Michael Plunk
item.description: Tweet Tonight, we were honored to have roughly 20 cadets from Group 6 in Pennsylvania visit our Squadron. Our cadets had the opportunity to mingle with the cadets from Pennsylvania, and get to know their fellow Civil Air Patrol cadets. … Continue reading →

item.title: Meeting 4/5/17
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rioux
item.description: Tweet Tonight, cadets were given aerospace maps and told to find landmarks, our squadron, and other airports. After finding landmarks on one map, they would switch to the next map, and repeat to see what could be found.

item.title: Meeting 3/29/17
item.dc:creator: Andrew Rioux
item.description: Tweet Tonight was the anticipated open house! We were able to promote our three aspects of Civil Air Patrol, which are Emergency Services, Aerospace Education, and Cadet Programs. We were able to showcase different parts of those, including our UAS … Continue reading →
